name: Stripe Radar AI Agent
description: Advanced fraud detection and prevention AI agent powered by Stripe Radar, analyzing transactions in real-time using machine learning trained on millions of global transactions

skills.name: Transaction Risk Scoring
skills.description: Evaluate transaction risk in real-time using 1000+ signals including device fingerprinting, behavioral analysis, and network patterns
examples: Score this transaction: $500 from new device
Calculate fraud probability for card-not-present transaction

skills.name: Dispute Prediction
skills.description: Predict likelihood of chargebacks and disputes before they occur based on transaction and customer patterns
examples: Predict dispute likelihood for this merchant
Identify transactions likely to result in chargebacks
Calculate dispute risk for subscription renewal

skills.name: Custom Rule Recommendation
skills.description: Recommend optimized fraud prevention rules based on your specific business patterns and risk tolerance
examples: Suggest rules to reduce false positives
Recommend block rules for high-risk regions
Optimize rules for subscription business model

skills.name: Behavioral Anomaly Detection
skills.description: Detect unusual patterns in transaction velocity, amounts, and customer behavior indicating potential fraud
examples: Detect velocity abuse on this card

skills.name: Fraud Investigation Assistant
skills.description: Assist analysts in investigating flagged transactions with evidence aggregation and pattern matching
